column8: Response of memory CD8+ T cells to severe acute respiratory syndrome (SARS) coronavirus in recovered SARS patients and healthy individuals.
column137: Tetramer staining of CTLs from healthy donors was positive in 5 out of 36 subjects and peaked 7 days after in vitro stimulation with heat inactivated SARS-CoV.
